org.omnaest.utils.webservice.rest
Class RestClientFactory

java.lang.Object
  org.omnaest.utils.webservice.rest.RestClientFactory
Direct Known Subclasses:
RestClientFactoryJersey
public abstract class RestClientFactory
extends Object

The RestClientFactory allows to produce proxies for given class or interface types which are based on the JSR-311 API (REST)

Author:
Omnaest
See Also:
newRestClient(Class)
